events.name: Raw Material Supply and Manufacturing for Lithium-Ion Batteries (LIBs)
events.wd_label: Raw Material Supply and Manufacturing for Lithium-Ion Batteries (LIBs)
events.wd_description: This event investigates the future raw material supply and manufacturing capabilities to meet the growing demand for lithium-ion batteries (LIBs) in the transportation and electricity sectors. It explores the availability of key materials, geopolitical risks, production challenges, and the geographical distribution of manufacturing capabilities.
events.description: This event investigates the future raw material supply and manufacturing capabilities to meet the growing demand for lithium-ion batteries (LIBs) in the transportation and electricity sectors. It explores the availability of key materials, geopolitical risks, production challenges, and the geographical distribution of manufacturing capabilities.

events.name: Material supply
events.wd_description: Tracking the supply of key materials used in lithium-ion batteries, including manganese, nickel, natural graphite, lithium, and cobalt.
events.description: Tracking the supply of key materials used in lithium-ion batteries, including manganese, nickel, natural graphite, lithium, and cobalt.

events.name: ganese supply
events.wd_description: Analyzing the supply of manganese for lithium-ion batteries, which is expected to meet the anticipated demand.
events.description: Analyzing the supply of manganese for lithium-ion batteries, which is expected to meet the anticipated demand.

events.name: kel supply
events.wd_description: Assessing the supply of nickel for lithium-ion batteries, which is expected to be sufficient for future demand.
events.description: Assessing the supply of nickel for lithium-ion batteries, which is expected to be sufficient for future demand.

events.name: ural graphite supply
events.wd_description: Evaluating the supply of natural graphite for lithium-ion batteries, which is projected to meet future demand.
events.description: Evaluating the supply of natural graphite for lithium-ion batteries, which is projected to meet future demand.

events.name: hium supply challenges
events.wd_description: Examining the challenges in scaling the supply of lithium to meet the growing demand for lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Examining the challenges in scaling the supply of lithium to meet the growing demand for lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: alt supply challenges
events.wd_description: Investigating the challenges in scaling the supply of cobalt, focusing on geopolitical risks and production capacity.
events.description: Investigating the challenges in scaling the supply of cobalt, focusing on geopolitical risks and production capacity.

events.name: Production challenges
events.wd_description: Addressing the challenges in ramping up the production of lithium-ion batteries to meet the rapid increase in demand.
events.description: Addressing the challenges in ramping up the production of lithium-ion batteries to meet the rapid increase in demand.

events.name: duction growth
events.wd_description: Analyzing the growth in production of lithium-ion batteries and the challenges associated with scaling production.
events.description: Analyzing the growth in production of lithium-ion batteries and the challenges associated with scaling production.

events.name: ply-demand imbalance
events.wd_description: Examining the imbalance between the rapid consumption of lithium-ion batteries and the slower growth in production.
events.description: Examining the imbalance between the rapid consumption of lithium-ion batteries and the slower growth in production.

events.name: Recycling limitations
events.wd_description: Investigating the limitations of recycling lithium-ion batteries and the impact on short-term supply.
events.description: Investigating the limitations of recycling lithium-ion batteries and the impact on short-term supply.

events.name: ycling feasibility
events.wd_description: Evaluating the feasibility of economically recovering lithium from recycled batteries under current market conditions.
events.description: Evaluating the feasibility of economically recovering lithium from recycled batteries under current market conditions.

events.name: rt-term supply impact
events.wd_description: Assessing the impact of limited recycling on the short-term supply of lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Assessing the impact of limited recycling on the short-term supply of lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Geographical distribution of manufacturing
events.wd_description: Analyzing the geographical distribution of lithium-ion battery manufacturing, with a focus on China, Japan, and Korea.
events.description: Analyzing the geographical distribution of lithium-ion battery manufacturing, with a focus on China, Japan, and Korea.

events.name: ufacturing capabilities
events.wd_description: Evaluating the manufacturing capabilities of China, Japan, and Korea, which dominate the lithium-ion battery market.
events.description: Evaluating the manufacturing capabilities of China, Japan, and Korea, which dominate the lithium-ion battery market.

events.name: de flows
events.wd_description: Analyzing the trade flows of lithium-ion batteries within Asia and to the United States.
events.description: Analyzing the trade flows of lithium-ion batteries within Asia and to the United States.

events.name: Electrolyte supply
events.wd_description: Examining the supply of electrolytes for lithium-ion batteries, which has not faced significant resource constraints to date.
events.description: Examining the supply of electrolytes for lithium-ion batteries, which has not faced significant resource constraints to date.

events.name: ctrolyte production
events.wd_description: Analyzing the production of electrolytes for lithium-ion batteries, focusing on the most commonly used electrolytes and their production capacities.
events.description: Analyzing the production of electrolytes for lithium-ion batteries, focusing on the most commonly used electrolytes and their production capacities.

events.name: ket analysis
events.wd_description: Evaluating the market for lithium-ion battery electrolytes, including overcapacity issues and geographical distribution of production.
events.description: Evaluating the market for lithium-ion battery electrolytes, including overcapacity issues and geographical distribution of production.

events.name: Rapid scaling challenges
events.description: Challenges related to rapidly scaling the production of materials like lithium and cobalt to meet the increasing demand for LIBs.

events.name: Recycling limitations
events.description: The current economic challenges of recycling lithium from used LIBs, which limits its potential as a significant short-term supply source.

events.name: Dominance of Asian manufacturing
events.description: The concentration of LIB manufacturing capabilities in Asia, specifically in China, Japan, and Korea, which constitutes 85% of the global manufacturing capacity

events.name: Economic feasibility of recycling
events.description: The current economic challenges of recycling lithium from used LIBs, which limits its potential as a significant short-term supply source
